root.name: Pandas vs Ninjas
root.description: OverviewThere is an old feud between pandas and ninjas, so old that no one remembers what started it (according to the game's about section). You control the pandas, because they are cuter. The main objective is to destroy the camps of ninjas in each level. The way you can achieve this is simple: the Big Panda throws small pandas towards the ninjas. You can control the strength and orientation of these shots. You can win a level by clearing it of all ninjas. You get your score based on the number of remaining small pandas, the ninjas and objects you hit and your accuracy.
